name: Agewalker - Ludum Dare 46 Version
description:
A 2D action-adventure game inspired by the NES and Gameboy classics!

Play through the opening areas of a grand adventure, where you, the legendary hero, have to save a world that died long ago! Explore the world, go off the beaten track, find new enemies and abilities, and much more!

The game was made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 46 Game Jam, in which the theme was 'Keep It Alive'. I was the sole developer, who handled art, programming, ect.

The game is short (about 5-15 minutes), but I tried to pack as much in there as possible! I plan on continuing development on the game in the coming weeks, fixing a few issues, as well as adding brand new things!

Music Credits

Music was sourced from freemusicarchive.org, and the following songs were used:

Audiobinger - Video_Game_Music_1

Komiku - 22 - The_adventure

Visager - 04 - The_Great_Forest

Visager - 05 - Battle

Visager - 12 - Title_Theme_Loop

Please Note: to continue forwards in text boxes, press E. I'll update the game to make this clearer shortly.

Also, for those from LD, I recently re-uploaded the file. This was because the one uploaded during the jam already had save file present - the only change was that I deleted that file, no changes were made to the actual game.
